proposal: Ahoy, Pirateflix community! Navigating the seas of open-source innovation, you've built a treasure trove for developers with 93 brave souls aboard the ETH network. Imagine enhancing this voyage with our DEX for a personalized trading deck or launching a lottery for a bit of fun among the crew. Let's chart a course together where every community member can deploy and share in the bounty. Ready to set sail? 🏴‍☠️📺
